A1-B2.rationale: A1 and B2 both discuss the limitations in retrieving high-quality evidence or references. While A1 focuses on improving retrieval quality to match gold references, B2 suggests improving the passage selection method with more advanced techniques.

A3-B1.rationale: A3 and B1 both address limitations in the scope of content generation, whether it's producing comprehensive Wikipedia pages or being restricted to the first passage of Wikipedia pages. Both highlight a limitation in the extent of content generated.
